name: Antivirus Service
description:
Viruses and ads are taking over your Windows XP computer. Stop viruses from overwhelming you with ads by closing the programs. When there are too many windows opened, your computer starts to lag and can crash.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 in 1 week!

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I recommend playing in the desktop version since it plays more smoothly.
